meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being homosocial.
meanings.sent1: In their homosocialities, the group of friends always supported each other.
meanings.sent2: She found comfort in the homosocialities of her female friends.
meanings.sent3: The homosocialities at the all-boys club were strong and unwavering.
meanings.sent4: The homosocialities among the teammates created a bond as tight as family.
meanings.sent5: The homosocialities in the workplace made for a positive and inclusive environment.

meanings.definition: The practice of socializing exclusively with members of one's own sex.
meanings.sent1: His homosocialities mainly involved hanging out with other guys from his neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The homosocialities at the girls' night out were always filled with laughter and fun.
meanings.sent3: Their homosocialities often revolved around watching sports together.
meanings.sent4: The homosocialities in the fraternity were a key part of the college experience.
meanings.sent5: She cherished the homosocialities she shared with her closest female friends.
